sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; function TransactionForm() { const [from, setFrom] = useState(""); const [to, setTo] = useState(""); const [type, setType] = useState(""); const [ref, setRef] = useState(""); const [amount, setAmount] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const transaction = { sender: from, receiver: to, ttype: type, reference: ref, amount: amount, }; console.log(transaction); }; return (

New Transaction

{ setTo(e.target.value); }} name="to" id="to" class="w-full bg-gray-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg focus:outline-none" type="text" placeholder="To" />
{ setRef(e.target.value); }} class="w-full bg-gray-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg focus:outline-none" type="text" name="transaction_reference" id="transaction_reference" placeholder="Transaction Reference" />
{ setAmount(e.target.value); }} class="w-full bg-gray-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg focus:outline-none" type="text" name="amount" id="amount" placeholder="Amount in Euro" />
); } export default TransactionForm;
